channel.title: Summoning a monster [317]
channel.description:
Hi, im just wondering if anyone of you has a code like ::greendrag and then it spawns a green dragon that follows you and when you attack some1 it attacks them also
I used to have this script but it is in my old computer that is now broken down so please can anyone of you give me it I'll give my highest appreciation.
